articles.content: In reply to the appeal made by the Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI), ICC ran through the footages again before changing their verdict in the Indore pitch, which had hosted the third Test … [+2339 chars]

articles.author: ESPNcricinfo staff
articles.title: Paris out of Australia A tour after battling back pain in Shield final - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: He will be replaced by South Australia's Jordan Buckingham for the two-match series in New Zealand
articles.content: Joel Paris played a key part in Western Australia's final victory  •  Getty Images
